channel.title: boo on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in boo on Barefoot Rob

item.title: can't give blood within four weeks of being abroad
item.description: 16:28 Thursday 12 November 2015 JST bah. Had I gone before my OZ trip, I’d (likely) have been accepted, and would have finished nearly a month of the 3 month countdown between donations.

item.title: ET contact event canceled
item.description: 09:38 Saturday 10 October 2015 JST Aww man. I was looking forward to successful contact. It was apparently canceled on Thursday but I didn’t notice until today.
